attributes.action: Make it mandatory for drivers who pass there test to sit an extra test on how to use a motorway safely and correctly before being allowed to use one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Learner drivers are not allowed on motorways whilst having lessons and rightly so, but why once they have passed there test they are allowed straight on to a motorway without any lessons of any kind. This petition is to make drivers who have just passed there test sit a motorway competance test before being allowed to use one, at least this way new drivers will not have an excuse for using the motorway incorrectly i.e. sitting in the middle lane of a motorway for no reason

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
